title: Diamond as Big as the Ritz - details about parents

content.prompt: The details about John’s parents (“John’s . . . addresses”) provided in the second sentence of the first paragraph primarily serve to illustrate their

choices.label: painstaking effort to improve their social position
commitment to upholding the town’s traditions

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
